item.description:
We'll be heading into uncharted territory. Although this place has been a fixture on the riverfront for a while, we still haven't tried the trivia here.

It's the standard Stump format but how many places can say they have a riverfront view from their deck?

According to their website, the trivia starts earlier than most - 7pm. So we should be out quicker than other places. Just make sure to come early as i'm not sure what the seating situation will be like.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation is guaranteed.

If you know your music, even better.

Game starts close to 7:00 and runs for about 2 hours!

See you there.

http://www.thewhiskeyrepublic.com/


**** Try to get down there earlier, by at least 6:40 so that we can be seated. Any winnings will be applied to a future event.
item.name: Trivia @The Whiskey Republic
